short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds resize handle to all textareas!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of web designers and UX experts robbing you of your legal right to resize text areas and write lots of text comfortably? With this plug-in you can break any perfect layout and make any text area as big as you want.
The only thing this plugin does is to remove vertical resize restrictions from text areas.
